Newt smiled and went to sit with a few of his friends. His friends didn't realize what was going on because Newt had put the box aside and pretended to get a drink of water and coming back with a full plate of pizza. He ate quickly and finished around the same time as the rest of the team
121211.title: The Game

1212111.content:
By the last day of the season, Newt weighed 172, a far way off from the 130 he weighed when starting football.

Newt had a respectable belly now, and his lineman performance had improved. Still the smallest on the team, Newt was one of the best.

Newt thought that once he had gained a few pounds the coach would stop encouraging him to gain weight, but sure enough, every practice he showed up with some type of tasty and fattening snack that Newt was forced to enjoy, lots of times in front of the whole team. Newt's friends caught on quickly once they saw Newt developing somewhat of a "beer gut" made of pizza, donuts, cola, and other snacks. The season ended, but Newt didn't slim down after the season. He had been used to eating constantly, and continued to do so.

He wasn't packing on pounds like before, but he still was gaining weight.

The summer went by, and it came time for football try outs
1212111.title: Before Summer

13.content: Why does she gain weight ?.....
13.title: Miley/Hannah

132.content: mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm burger, pizza, chocolate, sweets and mmmm fast food. miley had got addicted to junk foor she is sooo fat now
132.title: Food Addiction

133.content:
Lily's pink O-Phone rang.
"Hello, Hannah Montana's personal assistant Lola Levonda speaking.....you'd like to speak to Hannah.....well who wouldn't it's her personal line and all........
"Lily, give me the phone!" shouted Miley. Lily handed it over and Miley placed it next to her ear.
"Hello"
"Is this Miss Montana?"
"Yeah"
"Wonderful. We have a business proposal for you"
"What is it"
"We'd like you to be the star of our new billboard advertising campaign"
"And what are you advertising?"
"We'd like you to help us show the world how good the food products made by Chubblies are. There completly organic. We sell wide ranges of classy restaurant and children's foods, namely chicken, burgers, fries, all that lovely stuff with a touch of our special Chubbly magic"
"So it's fast-food?"
"It's organic, salt reduced, fat-decreased fun food with a small dab of our additive free Chubbly sauce"
"Has it been tested on animals?"
"No,no we're not inhuman. In fact, it hasn't really been tested at all. But it would be great if you could join our test group if you don't mind having to eat our wares four times a day for a fortnight. Then we're good to go"
"I can do that, it is my break and all. Is it really healthy?"
"Definetly! It's great as a treat and doesn't have a drop of that awful garbage they put in foods today. We own our own ranches, and each animal lives life to the full"
"Well i suppose if it's as good as you say it is it should be okay with my manager"
"Excellent. Call us back for details. Our number is 21841 2401294. Goodbye Miss Montana, and remember to enjoy your break"
The phone went silent. She handed it back to Lily, and then went to consult her dad.
"Can i do a little advert for Chubbly? They'll calll us back for all the details."
"Sure, if you don't mind doing it during your break. Who are they anyway?"
"They sell food, with a special sauce"
"What makes it so special?"
"I dunno, guess i'll find out when the first batch of test produce arrives"
Miley then straightened her Hannah wig and walked out the building, to a horde of autograph hunters and screaming fans. The trio pushed there way to the Limo. They got back home in less than half an hour. Miley walked up to her room, got changed and came down from the stairs.

What happens next?
133.title: Advertising a Fast Food Company

choices: Miley returns home to find the first batch of Chubbly food at her door
1331.content:
"Come on Miley, hurry up, We've gotta get to the mall before the bargain hunters do!" said Lily.
"It's just a new look by LaCarla. They come out every month and we're not even buying them" said Miley.
"It's just a reservation! All's we gotta do is let them check our sizes and they'll let us know when there available!" said Lily.
Miley walked out her house, caught a taxi to the mall and they were both there in no time. The shop Lily had her eyes on was just about to open, and a fast growing crowd was starting to form. They ran up to the window.
"Wow it does look great!" said Miley, looking at the many sequins on the LaCarla summer dress.
"It's opening!" shrieked Lily. They pushed there way through the door. The queue was long, but they finally got to the counter, told the assistant their individual sizes and what sort of design they'd like. The price was a bit steep, but they reckoned they could afford it. They were about to walk out the store with their reservation ticket, but they then bumped into .....Amber!
"Oooh, two losers who'd love to wear LaCarla! Well...sorry but they've sold out!"
"No they havn't, we've got our tickets right here" said Lily, who held up hers right in front of Amber's nose. Amber glanced at it for a second, then quickly shone her sharp nails. Guessing what was coming next, Miley quickly slapped the hand away, and Lily shoved the ticket back into her pocket.
"EEEEEWWWW....you losers just spoiled my manicure! I'll have to go through this day with your germs on my fingernails!"
"I thought Ashley would have cleaned it all off by now, Heck where is she anyway?"
"Ohh, she's kinda busy in the store. She said she couldn't remember her size, so the assistants are helping her out. Like, she should be here by now. Don't worry, one day, i'm sure LaCarla will bring out the worst in your figure"
Lily and Miley walked back into the store. The queue had grown a lot bigger, and Miley noticed there weren't enough staff to deal with the demand. Her eyes shot to the right of the store. About five employees were taking measurements all over Ashley.
"Quick you slowpokes! I told you and pay you each treble your salary if you all hurry up with this!"
"It looks like she's trying to buy the clothes before they come out!" said Lily.
"Buy them? It looks like she can't fit in them!" said Miley.
Ashley groaned heavily as the assitant measured her waistline. She then grabbed her bag and pulled out a chocolate bar, and then stuffed the whole thing in her mouth. Her gut jiggled a lot. Ashley was huge. Since the school holidays started two months ago, she had put on a massive amount of weight. Her once thin slim and poised look had now changed into a fat, chubby, clumsy appearance. Her stomach was puffy, her arms and legs both showed flabs of fat, and most embarrassingly of all, a whole inch of flab hung steadily over her pants, wobbling as she twisted.
"How did she get so fat!?" shouted Miley. "This is gonna be amazing when school starts again!"
"She isn't the only one...." said Lily, handing Miley a paper. On the front page was Mikayla. There were two pictures of her, accompanied by a rather shocking headline.
"Mikayla turned down?" said Miley, confused. She read the lines eagerly.

Pop princess Mikayla has been denied the role in the next Hollywood teen-hit movie Dreams of Stardom, due to her rapid weight gain. When asked to put on a few pounds to play the role of the movie's slightly chubby main character Heather, she arrived at the studio after a break of a few months having gained several stones. When told she had to lose a lot, she refused, and after being given a month to reconsider and lose her extra weight, she arrived at the studio only to be turned down in favour of Miss Selena Tarlock. Her hopes of achieving pop dominance during Hannah Montana's break has been shattered, and it is also believed that her fat frame has affected both her singing and dancing. When interviewed, she blamed her manager for not "putting the diet" in her Cola and forgetting to "take the meat" out of her burgers.

"Wow this is great. Two of my worst enemies stuffed to the brink!" said Miley "Now i can totally relax!"

What happens next?
1331.title: Her and Lily go shopping

choices: Shortly after she feels a little hungry again and finds dessert in the box
Lily calls her to ask how her first Chubbly's meal was
13311.content:
Miley was able to find the LaCarla dress that she wanted and so was Lily. Both were happy to get a new dress and happy that two rivals had gotten fat, particuarly Miley. After her limo dropped Lily off at home, Miley arrived at home, and headed upstairs to her room to try on her dress. She slide it on and looked over her figure in the mirror. The pink satin dress looked fabulous on her thin athletic frame. She then hung up the dress and changed into a cute short white skirt and a yellow tank top. Just then she heard her dad calling for her. "Coming daddy" she called sweetly before quickly heading downstairs.

"What is it daddy?" Miley asked her dad Billy Ray Cyrus. "What is this package from Chubbly's? It's not another new pair of shoes. You already have dozens" Billy replied. He had never understood Miley's obession with food. "Not at all daddy. This is from a new food company. They make food which is really tasty but is really good food for you. They asked me to try their foodand become their spokesgirl and I agreed. I am sorry I didn't ask you first but I figured you would approve of this" Miley explained. Billy smiled and gave Miley a hug. "I am proud of you bud. Glad to see you thinking about something other then boys and clothes" Billy replied. He gave her a hug and a kiss on the head before handing her the box of chubblys and then heading upstairs to his bedroom.

Miley carried the box over to the couch, took a seat, and crossed her legs. She loved how the box was already warm so she didn't have to worry about warming up the food. She quickly opened the box and was surprised to see two cheese burgers with a large order of fries. It all looked and smelled delicious and not to mention like real fast food but it was Chubbly's food and healthy for you, it said so on the box. She got up, walked over to the fridge, got out a pepsi, and returned to the couch. She then turned on the tv, flipped through a few stations before finding a movie on that she loved. She picked up one of the cheeseburgers, laid back against the couch, and began eating the cheeseburger. Oh my god, wow. This is so good, this is like a fast food hambuger Miley thought to herself. She quickly consumed it and then took a couple sips of her soda. She then picked up a handful of fries and ate them all too. Mm, they are like fast food fries too she thought to herself. She then proceeded to quickly eat the second burger and the rest of fries in between sips of her soda until she had eaten it all. "Mm, that was delicious and filling" she moaned outloudly softly to herself as she relaxed on the couch, continuing to watch her belly. She was feeling pretty fully and began to gently rub her full belly which felt very nice and content. I forgot how good it feels to full she thought to herself.
13311.title: Miley returns home to find the first batch of C...

choices: It's Lilly, apparently Cubblys sent her food too!
It's Chubblys calling to tell her another shipment will be arriving soon.
133111.content:
Despite having just ingested what amounted to quite a large meal for the teen, Miley was still not content. There was a little space left in her stomach, space that could be filled by the rather enticing box sitting at the bottom of her Chubblys container. I really shouldn't do it, but I did promise to eat everything, right?

Miley grabbed the box out from the bottom of the container and opened it. Inside was a perfectly square, and rather large, brownie. It looked innocent enough; on top were sprinkles and a bit of whipped cream that made the treat look fancier than it really was.

"Well, bottoms up!" Miley's belly gave a little gurgle as she took a bite of half the brownie.

What happened next could best be described as euphoric. The combination of sweet chocolate perfectly offset the salty taste from the burger. More than just that, Miley's taste buds were doing flips in her mouth. The explosion of perfectly manufactured dessert was just that, perfect.

She quickly finished off the rest of the treat, relishing in the taste.

Suddenly her belly gave a rather ominous growl.

"Ugh..." Miley's tummy shifted around a bit, trying to accommodate the new visitor to her system. There was sudden sharp pain that she hadn't noticed before, mostly because she was so caught up in eating. The after effects of her little binge were just starting, and considering the food she'd just eaten, it wasn't pretty.

"Oh god!"

Miley's entire digestive tract felt like it was on fire. Here stomach was like a boiler, compressing and reducing the Chubblys and discovering just what made their sauce so special. A pressure was building up inside of Miley, and it was not content to merely sit there.

At first she tried to placate it with some belches and burps.

"Urp." A little bit of rel- "Pffftttt."

Miley swore she had just heard what could be considered a fa-

Just then, her belly rumbled and roared, finally sending her gas from reserve to explode.

The unfortunate series of events that happened afterword could be thought of as "volcanic".

Miley's body was on a firesale. Fart after juicy fart escaped from her rear. She had positioned herself so her belly rested on the cushion of the couch, so to facilitate expulsion. The gas in the room grew exponentially, making the entire area smell like a toxic waste dump, and for all purposes, it was. The sauce had really kicked in, and it was really making Miley change her mind about Chubblys.

"How, oof, do they, ugh, expect, urp, me to think anything positive about their food when it, oh god, is ripping my insides apart!"

Then, just as suddenly as it had begun, the onslaught stopped. Miley's belly finally settled into a weird tranquility after the chaos that had been prior. And weirder still, she actually felt hungry.

Miley's belly growled. "That's odd, I didn't think explosive gas lead to hunger." Yet sure enough, Miley's tummy required something more, and it was rather upset at being denied food at the immediate moment. "I sure hope I can get something more to eat!"

Sadly she couldn't. Despite stuffing herself with chips, to the point of starring to reach her previous state of stuffed, Miley still had a weird gnawing hunger for something more. It was at this vulnerable moment that Miley's phone rang.

"Hello?"
133111.title: Sweet Desire

choices: Wait for the Chubbly’s extra meal box
Go check the fridge for something to keep her busy
1331112.content:
As Miley took the phone, a cheerful voice answered back from the line.

“Good Afternoon Miss Montana! My name is Arthur Clarke and I’m the administrator of the Chubbly Testing Group to which you’ve been assigned. I’m also your reference contact for any issue and/or question regarding our delicious and healthy food. I’m truly sorry to disturb you but we at Chubbly’s have our customer satisfaction at our heart and wanted to inform all of our testers about an issue with the meal box that has been, or it’s going to be, delivered to you. ”

‘Well’ thought Miley ‘better late than never’

Still even though she was fairly sure what was the issue, she pushed the matter to Mr. Clarke.

“What is the Issue? Is there any problem with our food!?”

“Well, Miss Montana, as a matter of fact….Yes, there is.

You see, we wanted to warn you against eating the common looking brownie that has been delivered to you and to all others tester. You see, for as much as we care for our animals and use only the best for them, there are still people who thinks that we are monsters and to damage us they have tried to sabotage the meal boxes prepared for the testing groups all over the State.

These, so called, environmentalist, have in fact substituted our deliciously prepared brownies stored in those boxes with a polluted version that could cause ….well… some discomforts, if consumed. We are truly sorry for the accident and I have to inform you that the perpetrators have already been sued and legal procedures will be taken against them at the soonest.”

Miley, still rubbing her sore, but still hungry, belly was relieved in hearing that those horrible after effects of the brownie were due to an activist attack. That meant that Chubbly’s food was all right to eat and as good as many other, to say the least. Plus, as any self-respecting company, they had not waited to sue the culprits and start legal issues.

That, in her book, was a point in favor of Chubbly’s, since it couldn’t be a scam if they had the strength to perform legal procedures.

The voice of Mr. Clarke brought Miley back from her reverie.

“Furthermore, Miss Montana, Chubbly would like to provide to all of you tester an additional meal box from the scheduled four meals a day, for the rest of the testing time as a way to apologize for this dreadful inconvenient.

If you have any other wish and/or complaint to place, please to call me back to this number and I’ll gladly answer to all your doubts.

Once again, we’re truly sorry for this troublesome issue and hopeful on your forgiveness. ”

“Er…Mister Clarke?”

“Yes, Miss Montana?”

“When…When, the fifth meal box, has been scheduled to arrive?”

“Oh! So sorry , Miss. I completely forgot. It has been scheduled for the mid-afternoon, for the duration of the testing.

And, one last thing Miss?”

Miley was already thinking to her incoming meal, since she was still so hungry and for this reason she didn’t took all her attention to the phone call. If she had it done, things could have changed drastically.

“Yeah?”

“I know it’s preposterous to think so, but there is the possibility that the testing period may be extended.

Everyone here knows that it won’t happen but our Corporate insists that we provide the information and that our testers will give their disposition to continue the testings if an extension will be called on. A simple voice recognition will suffice, Miss.”

“Like…Yeah, yeah…whatever...”

“Thank you so much for your availability, Miss Montana, we at Chubbly’s can’t wait for the time in which you’ll become our spoke person.

Have a nice day.”

As the phone went off, Miley looked at her watch and couldn’t believe that it was still only lunch time.

She felt her belly grumble in hunger but she didn’t want to spoil herself, since another meal box from Chubbly’s was going to arrive in a few hours.

But would a "simple" snack spoil her appetite?
1331112.title: Chubbly's calling...

choices: She wakes up on her own just as someone have finished cleaning her up...
13311122.content:
Miley rose from the couch where she was parked, pausing the movie she was watching.

She knew that the additional meal box from Chubbly’s was arriving but she reasoned that a quick bite, something small enough to just quench her hunger, was just what she needed. She walked toward the kitchen and began looking through the cupboards, searching and grabbing for whatever took her fancy at that moment. The counter behind her began, soon to be filled with bags and boxes of various snacks and energy bars, from Oreo biscuits to BBQ flavored Lays chips, from Snicker bars to KitKats.

Her inquisitive hands moved through all of the cupboards, grabbing something and then leaving it behind her on the counter, until she finally reached the fridge.

Once she opened it she stood mesmerized for a few moments as in front of her there were pies, cakes and tubs of cookie dough ice cream.

She couldn’t know that Bobbie Ray had went to the market that morning and hadn’t had enough willpower to avoid the discounted sweets section of the same. Due to this their fridge was now filled to the brim with sugary goodness.

Licking her lips in anticipation, as her belly grumbled even louder, she was already making a grab for a deliciously looking cake, but then she managed to close the fridge door, slamming it shut, trying to forget about the heavenly assortment of food.

“No, Miley…” She said to herself under her breath “Just…Just a quick snack, remember?”

With her mind still distracted by that vision she simply grabbed whatever there was on the counter and brought it to the couch, where she divided it in two big mounds to her right the sweets, to her left the salted. Finally, she seated right in the middle and, as the movie was un-paused she grabbed the first thing that she could find between the snacks.

A big plastic bag with twelve Snickers inside it.

Hungry and angry at herself, she unwrapped the chocolate bar and gave it a big bite, munching angrily as she mulled over the fact that there was so many goodies to eat in the fridge and she couldn’t have them.

As she soon fell enthralled by the movie on screen, she kept eating opening up bags of chips and boxes of treats, all the while, bringing them to her lips distractedly, making a mess of herself, as chocolate and chips dust mingled with cookie crumbles around her mouth.

Almost an hour later, as the movie was reaching the climaxing end, she began to exhale small burps as her hunger began to subside, still she kept pushing chocolate bar after chocolate bar in her mouth, even though at a much slower rate.

Not even fifteen minutes later Miley fell asleep, just as her small bloated pot belly had stopped growing outward and was now thigh as a drum, peeking slightly from under her shirt.
13311122.title: There is no harm in just a snack, isn’t it?

133112.content: Right as Miley finished stuffing her face, her phone rang. It was Lilly, asking how the Chubbly's meal was. Miley told her it was amazing, and that she had to come over and try some. In five minutes, Miley and Lilly were eating more Chubbly's. After finishing they....
133112.title: Lily calls her to ask how her first Chubbly'...

1331121.content:
A few weeks later..

"Lily, is it just me or does something feel different?" Miley asks Lily while she was trying to reach for her 6th Chubbly's meal of the day.
"What do you mean? Everything feels normal here" says Lily while stuffing herself with even more Chubbly's.
"I'm really not sure.." Miley says while rubbing her now permanent double chin.
"You know what, I think they must have skimped on the Chubbly's special sauce this meal" Lily said while picking up her lower belly with her now plump fingers to get rid of a scratch under it.
"Yeah, that's probably it! Oh well, lets get back to eating our lunch before Jackson comes and leaves us starving" Miley states as she reaches with her now fat arms to reach her next meal.
"Miley, remember what happened to Mikaya yesterday on the news?" Lily said as she got up to waddle to the fridge for some more soda.
"You mean when they found her sneaking in candy to the actress awards or when her dress ripped off revealing her 500 pound self in all it's glory?" Miley said laughing, causing her new body to wobble.
"Do you remember how her body shook as she tried to collect the chocolate in her dress!" Lily responded slightly panting as she sat back down.
"I'd cry if I ever got that fat.."

"Hey girls, I'm back from tour!"
1331121.title: Time flies when you're hungry.

choices: She was eating the rest of the Chubbly food
She was calling Chubbly, asking for more
She was calling Lily, asking her to come over to try the Chubbly food
1332.content:
Miley was about to get comfy on the couch when her tummy let out a large gurgle.

"Huh, I didn't realise I was so hungry!" Miley said to herself. She headed over to the refrigerator to find that only the freezer was well stocked. That's when she noticed the note her dad had left on the side:

Out to get some groceries, be back later - RR x

Miley sighed and grabbed a pint of ice cream and a spoon, and made her way back over to the couch, turning on the tv.

An hour (and a whole pint of ice cream) later, Miley awoke to a knock on the door.

"I guess dad forgot his key again..." She mumbled, wiping the chocolate stain from her mouth. "Coming!"

What she didn't expect was to find what seemed like four subscription boxes on her doorstep, all smelling delicious!

Miley grabbed the note on the top.

Dear Miss Montana, we hope you enjoy your first day of Chubbly's!
Our dedicated delivery service will drop your day's worth of goodies off every morning, and be sure to let us know what you think!
- Chairty Chubb, founder of Chubbly

"Huh...I guess I don't need to call them back to confirm after all..." Miley thought as she brought the boxes in.

She set them on the side and started to make her way back over to the couch, when her stomach grumbled again.

"Well, I guess I could try just one thing..."

She took the box on top, opening it to find a thick, juicy fried chicken burger inside, with a side of bacon cheese fries. Her mouth salivated at the sight and before she knew it, she was shovelling the food into her mouth.

"Mmmm." She grunted as she took the last bite, Chubbly sauce staining her already dirty top.

She stared at the second box, hunger and desire coming over her again. She lifted the lid to find dessert - a New York-style cheesecake.

Miley didn't even bother to get cutlery, she scooped handfuls of the cake in her mouth. Before she knew it, she'd finished the whole thing.

She snapped out of the food haze. "Woah...what happened there?" She said to herself, her hand making its way onto her bloated tummy. She didn't notice that it was already starting to go soft.

That's when she heard her dad's car pull up.

She grabbed the empty Chubbly boxes and threw them in the trash before grabbing the last two boxes of food and made her way up to her room, hiding both herself and her binge from Robby Ray.

"Miley! I'm home!"

Miley didn't make a sound.

Robby Ray spotted the empty ice cream tub and smiled. "She must be sleepin' off all that ice cream."

If only he knew what she was really up to...
1332.title: She gets Hungry

choices: Robbie Ray and Lilly receive Chubbly orders and get addicted too
The next morning - Lilly comes over and sees what Miley has done
13321.content:
Miley was crouched at the side of her bed, taking bite after bite of her sticky rib and melted cheese gyro as if she'd lost all self control. Chubbly sauce was smeared all over her tee, face and fingers, slowly making its way into her hair with every bite, but it was as if it didn't matter, the hunger for the food was the only thing she could focus on.

When she finished the last bite, a whine escaped her lips as she scrambled for the last box, their stickiness making it a little difficult to open the box. From the smell, she could tell it was something savory as drool fell down her chin in anticipation. After she finally managed to open the box, she didn't waste a second pulling a piece of extra cheesy pizza from the box, the mozzarella and chubbly sauce combo oozing from every slice and landing in the pool of grease that lay underneath each slice.

Miley didn't seem to notice (or care) how bad this supposedly 'healthy' food was, the hunger was just to much, and she couldn't seem to satisfy it. The amount of food she'd eaten in the past two hours was insane: a pint of ice cream, 1 burger, a huge portion of cheesy bacon fries, a whole cheesecake, a large, stuffed-to-overflowing gyro and now she was easily making her way through a 14 slice pizza!

Her belly didn't seem to be complaining just yet though, straining against the tee that was slowly making its way up over the dome, the band of her pants falling below the mass while she ate the cheesecake. It was well and truly hard, with a thin layer of fat developing with each slice or two.

When the last piece had passed her lips, a rather loud burp erupted from her mouth, shocking the teen as she covered her mouth, giggling.

Suddenly, a wave of exhaustion fell over her as she tried to crawl into the bed above her, grunting and struggling with her extra girth. She kicked the now-empty boxes under her head and fell into a deep sleep. Her hunger seemingly disappearing - for now.

A hand made its way to her belly subconsciously, rubbing the slowly softening flesh that her tee could no longer contain. Chubbly's idea was for the first box to give customers a euphoric experience that they'd be desperate to relive, with an extra 5 or so pounds being added to the participants figure that they wouldn't notice initially. After that, daily delivery would add a pound or two, make people more lazy and also make their appetite increase.

Little did Miley know that the days of her feeling full were now behind her, and that both her and Hannah had a bigger life ahead of them.

Chubbly's plans didn't end there though - they were going to make Chubbly's the only food anyone wanted, and it would all be because of Miley and Hannah.
13321.title: She was eating the rest of the Chubbly food

choices: They arrive at Chubbly's, and all fall under the Chubbly spell
The limo has some Chubbly's for the ride over
133212.content:
The doorbell rang the next morning. Lilly was at the Stewart house with breakfast from Rico's. When a sleepy Robbie Ray answered the door, Lilly handed him a brown paper bag with a breakfast sandwich inside and made her way up to Miley's room before her dad could say or do anything.

"Morning sleepyhead!" Lilly chirped as she burst into Miley's room. Miley grumbled from under the covers.

"Awh, come on-ouch!" Lilly sighed, dropping onto the bed next to her, the sharp corner of a Chubbly's box dug into her thigh as she unknowingly sat down, the grease slowly spreading onto her bare thighs and the bottom of her shorts.

"Ewww!" Lilly jumped up, grabbing a handful of tissues from Miley's nightstand and tried to wipe it away. That's when she noticed the other empty Chubbly's box and stains all over Miley's bed and clothes on the floor. "What the hell Miley..." Lilly muttered as she closed the door and opened the curtains to see only a fraction of Miley's binge the night before.

Lilly could hear Miley stirring under the covers, as well as the telltale sound of the paper bag full of breakfast sandwiches and hash browns being crinkled as Miley chowed down. At this point Lilly could take no more, and pulled the comforter off her friend to reveal Miley stuffing her face with both her and Lilly's breakfast, a little belly visible under her wrecked tee. Lilly grabbed the bag and its contents.

"What is wrong with you?!" Lilly scolded, pointing at the trash and stains.

Miley struggled to sit up, her belly still heavy (yet almost back to normal) from the night before, crossing her arms. "What are you talking about? Nothing is wrong with me." She sulked.

"Have you looked at yourself in the mirror, or better yet looked at the state of your room? It's a total mess! What did you do last night?"

Miley didn't move, her eyes stayed focused on Lilly. "So I had a little too much to eat last night. The Chubbly's food was out of this world, you'd do the same."

Lilly sighed, knowing she wouldn't win. Miley's stomach growled, her face turning a little pink under her messy cheeks. Lilly threw the back back to Miley. "Fine. I'll try and tidy some of this up while you satisfy your appetite, I wasn't that hungry anyway."

Miley didn't hesitate, shoving mouthful after mouthful of breakfast sandwich and hash brown in her mouth. Lilly glanced at her best friend as she gathered all the rubbish she could. She noticed Miley's already bloated stomach sticking out, worrying what exactly this Chubbly's food was going to do.

Little did she know that Chubbly's had that covered.

***

After Miley finally got out of bed, showered and changed into some sweats and a new tee, they both relaxed on the couch, ready for a day of watching TV when Lilly's phone rang.

"Hi, Hannah Montana's personal assistant Lola Levonda speaking."

"Hi there Lola, my name is Joanna Fudge from Chubbly's. I was wondering if I could speak to Miss Montana."

Lilly looked at her friend, hesitating. "...sure." She passed the phone over to Miley.

"Hannah here, how can I help?"

"Miss Montana! Joanna from Chubbly's here. I just wanted to check and see how you enjoyed your Chubbly's delivery yesterday."

"The food was incredible! From the pizza, to the cheesecake and the fries and gyro. The taste was incredible." Miley exclaimed, her mouth watering at the memory.

Lilly looked at her friend, wide eyed. Surely they must have been only single portions... she hoped.

"That's great to hear! Well, I know it's short notice, but I was wondering if you'd come in to do a photoshoot and an ad for the brand, help us get our name out there." Joanna asked.

Miley smiled "Today? Sure, I don't have any plans."

"Great! We'll send a driver to come and pick you up in about half an hour, is that okay? You can bring your manager and assistant along with you as well."

"Awesome! We'll see you then!" Miley hung up and turned to Lilly excitedly. "Hannah's got a photoshoot at Chubbly's! Let's go get ready!"

The brunette jumped off the couch and ran up to her room, pausing outside her dad's office to let him know.

"Honey...I don't know if I like the idea of this...what do they do again?" Robby Ray said warily.

"They're a healthy food subscription service. Please?" Miley pleaded as Lilly tailed behind her.

Robby sighed. "Fine. But if I think there'll be trouble, we're leaving straight away, okay?"

Miley hugged her dad and carried on up to her room. "Come on Lilly, we need to turn into Hannah and Lola!"

Lilly rolled her eyes and reluctantly followed, her gut telling her something bad would happen...
133212.title: Spreading the Chubbly love

1332121.content:
Miley could barely contain her excitement on the way to Chubbly's HQ.

As soon as the limo stopped, Miley jumped out and made her way towards the front doors, Lilly and Robby Ray following slowly behind.

"Where are we?" Asked Lilly, adjusting her hot pink wig.

Robby Ray took a moment before answering her, watching his daughter's odd behaviour. He knew something was off about her, but he could place it.

"I don't know honey." He shook his head as he made his way inside.

'Hannah' was already talking excitedly with a well dressed woman in the lobby.

"Miss Montana, we're so glad you could make it here today. The plan is for you to do a few short video clips for us to run as ads, and then we'll do a nice photoshoot, how does that sound?"

"Will there be Chubbly food?"

"Of course! It wouldn't be a Chubbly shoot without the best Chubbly food for our superstar spokeswoman!" The woman smiled, before turning her attention to Lilly and Robby Ray. "And there will be enough Chubbly food on offer for your manager and assistant too." She added.

Before anyone could protest, the trio were guided through heavy duty double doors and down a long hallway, the smell of sweet and savory treats getting stronger with every step.

"Who are you?" Lilly asked as they walked.

"Why, I'm Joanna Fudge, Chubbly's CEO." Joanna answered, not even turning to meet Lilly's gaze.

She stopped in front of a dark blue door, opening it. "Here we are."

Miley ran in.

The set up looked like any normal studio. Props littered the sides of the room, including a plush chair, camera equipment and a rack of clothes, and along the far wall was a long banquet table filled with covered silver trays.

A portly man walked over, a camera slung around his neck. "Hi there, I'm Mitch Marshall, I'll be your director and photographer today." He greeted, holding his hand out to Robby Ray as Lilly followed Miley over to the food table, batting her hands off the tray lids.

Joanna clapped her hands together with glee. "Great. Shall we get started?"

***

"Hi, I'm Hannah Montana. When I'm on the road, it can be really hard to get a good meal that keeps me going throughout the day. Thanks to Chubbly's, I don't have to worry about that anymore!" Hannah said to the camera, a smile on her face as she held a seemingly healthy chicken burger up to the camera before taking a bite. She barely stifled a groan. "Mmmm, delicious!"

"Cut!" Shouted Joanna. "Great, Miss Montana."

Miley wasn't listening as she devoured the rest of the burger, Chubbly sauce yet again spilling on her face.

Lilly was standing in the corner, horrified at what was happening. They'd been here less than an hour and she'd watched Miley devour 4 bowls of creamy pasta, a whole pie and now three burgers, her stomach getting bigger with each shot. Robby Ray had stepped out a while ago to sign some paperwork and hadn't come back.

Her stomach let out another growl. The smell of the food had been tempting her since the shoot had started, but she was determined to not take a bite.

Miley (as Hannah) wiped the sauce off her face with her sleeve before licking her fingers. The shirt she was wearing was slowly getting tighter around her middle. It wasn't just her stomach that was slowly getting bigger though - Lilly had noticed her face becoming puffier, her thighs getting thicker in the jeans she was wearing and her arms filling out the sleeves of her tops more. As soon as she finished licking her lips, she made her way over to the table and grabbed some chocolate chip cookies from next to Lilly.

"How can you eat so much?" Lilly asked in shock.

"Whaddya mean?" Miley mumbled through bites.

Lilly sighed, not even bothering to explain. She knew she wouldn't get anywhere.

Just then Robby Ray reappeared through the door, and Lilly's heart sank. Robby was devouring a donut, with another two in his free hand. He already had a small pot belly straining against his button down shirt. Great Lilly thought, I guess I'm on my own with this.

Lilly turned to Miley, about to ask her a question when Miley shoved a cookie in her mouth. Lilly's eyes went wide as the flavors exploded in her mouth. She couldn't fight it as her mouth chewed the gooey cookie and her hand reached out for more.

Joanna smiled as she watched Robby join the girls, all of them feasting like there was no tomorrow. "Perfect."

***

Four hours later, the shoot was finally over. Both Miley and Lilly had taken off their wigs and were lying on a large beanbag chair, gorging on large bowls of crispy bacon and extra cheese mac and cheese that rested on their domed bellies.

Miley's was significantly bigger, having started well before Lilly. She weighed around 180 pounds now, almost double the weight she'd been only two days ago. Gone was the toned popstar Hannah Montana, in her place was someone who looked like they barely worked out. Her soft, jiggly belly spilled into the beanbag at the sides, the once baggy clothing starting to get tight once again. After each shot, Miley had had to change into something slightly bigger to fit her growing girth, not noticing why her clothing had gotten tighter or why she was slowly wearing looser and bigger clothing. Her chubby fingers scooped another spoonful of cheesy pasta onto the spoon and into her mouth, her double chin slowly making her neck disappear with every dish. Her cherubic cheeks looked more like a hamster's now, as the weight had not been limited to just her large pot belly. Miley's arms and thighs were now thick and chunky, widening with her hips, breasts and belly as she continued to eat, her stomach seemingly not satisfied yet as the Chubbly sauce turned almost all the food she consumed into pure fat.

Lilly's gain was less significant, but being slightly smaller than Miley made it look like she wasn't too far behind the Hannah Montana star. At forty pounds heavier, her body was certainly more 'bottom heavy' with the weight being carried around her pot belly, wide hips and thick thighs. Her breasts remained small, looking like pockets of fat while her face had also filled out some, a double chin forming on her rounded face. She was also now in new clothes - a pair of now form-fitting sweats and a tank top.

Robby Ray looked like a very different man. Gone was his muscular frame, in its place was a huge gut that spilled over onto his thighs as he sat munching on what must have been his tenth fried chicken burger. He was now around 280lbs of lard, with the chair he sat on creaking and threatening to break under his new girth.

The trio were unaware of Joanna in the corner, uploading the first of many new ads that Chubbly were going to run, deals already in place with most schools in the US to take up Chubbly boxes from tomorrow morning for kids, and a number of celebrity endorsements lined up for the next few days. She didn't care for Hannah Montana's real identity, or that of her father or friend's, they were just pawns in her bigger picture. Miley, Lilly and Robby Ray were only three of Chubbly's first victims. Soon, everyone would have the taste of Chubbly's on their lips.
1332121.title: Foodie photoshoot!

13321212.content:
In the last month, Chubbly had taken over the continental US, and were well on their way to taking over the world.

There was a small resistance group trying to fight them, but most people couldn't avoid Chubbly products. People everywhere slowly ballooned as they consumed food and became somewhat addicted.

Back in Malibu, Miley and the gang had (in part) got their minds and lives back.

After the Hannah Montana Chubbly ads had aired initially, Hannah had faced a lot of backlash. Thanks to Miley's expanding figure and her lack of interest in being Hannah anymore, she'd 'retired' to live a 'normal' life. As more and more people chowed down on Chubbly, their love of Hannah Montana had faded, so luckily for Miley she could just be a normal kid again.

The Chubbly sauce that Miley, Lilly and Robby Ray had initially tried was a higher concentrate than the product on the market, so their gains slowed down over the next few weeks.

Robby Ray's gut had grown even more, hanging further over his thick thighs and with his sizable love handles feeding into his gut. By now, he was pushing 350lbs, his face as round as a soccer ball as his cheeks pushed further and further up his face. Because his gain was initially so sudden, he'd struggled to get used to his new girth and waddled unevenly even now, and was constantly winded.

Lilly's pear-shaped body had grown as well, with her tummy, thighs and butt feeling the most damage still. She now found it difficult to fit her lower half through most standard doorways (although with everyone's growing bodies, doorways were slowly being widened to adapt). With every step, her lower half jiggled and bounced, her belly moving as if it had it's own mind as her body moved in waves from side to side with every step, her belly hanging slightly lower with every passing day as she consumed Chubbly burgers, fries and sweet treats. Her face had filled out somewhat, making her look even younger - when she smiled, her cheeks pushed up and made her double chin look even more prominent, and her breasts sagged down, the pockets of fat starting to rest on the top of her belly. She'd just passed 220lbs.

Miley showed the most change though. Even though her gain had slowed dramatically, she was now pushing the scales at 270bs, having kept up momentum since that fateful day at Chubbly HQ. Her body was basically a ball of lard: there was no way Miley Stewart was going to go back to what she was less than two months ago. Her cheeks had passed the stage of 'cherubic' weeks ago; although constantly rosy, they were starting to make it hard for her to see when she was chewing, her mouth always covered in Chubbly grease, sugar and sauce. Her neck had at this point almost disappeared as her triple chin pushed down and fat has settled on her shoulders - in another week it would be nonexistent.

Her large breasts were almost one, a large pocket of fat settling between the two as they sagged onto her belly that pushed out over a foot now, sagging down over half her tree trunk, mottled with cellulite thighs. Even Miley's back had gained fat, with three love handles adorning each side of her bulging back while her arms had grown their own bingo wings that flapped with even the slightest movement, her chubby fingers looking like a babies with movement being more limited with every pound she gained. At this point, she could barely hold a pen - all she really did with them was grab food to but in her mouth.

Miley wasn't immobile yet, but she was having more trouble than her father getting around, with even just two steps exerting her large frame. She'd already made herself bed bound almost, as she struggled on a daily basis to get out of bed with her muscles decaying from lack of any exercise. Miley had to literally roll out of bed if she wanted to make a trip to the bathroom, shuffle through the door and then as gently as she could manage, lower herself down onto the toilet, her legs having almost morphed from thigh to calf and straining her knees with every bed.

Chubbly watched on with glee as the world became obese, and they had Hannah Montana to thank for that.
